job.title: Machine Learning Data Engineer-Photos
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brDo you have a passion for building the best photo library in the worldbrbrbriPhone is the most popular camera in the world Detailed integration of software and hardware has delivered magical experiences like Photos Memories and Portrait Mode The Camera amp Photos team creates privacyrespecting machine learning technologies to ship emotional experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwidebrbrbrWe are looking for an outstanding machine learning data engineer to drive data efforts infrastructure and benchmarking for the next generation of thoughtful and personal products we deliver If you thrive at the intersection of applied machine learning data science and infrastructure this position will excite and inspire youbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brDemonstrated expertise in data sciencebrbrExceptional problemsolving and interpersonal skillsbrbrKnowledge of data structures algorithms and objectoriented programmingbrbrGood programming skills in Python and Bashnix experiencebrbrA passion for visualization and fairness in AIbrbrProven experience or education in statistics and distributed systemsbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brIn this role you will drive data analysis and acquisition efforts to power machine learning algorithms develop tools and workflows to streamline algorithm development and benchmarking brbrbrCandidates should have a proven track record that demonstrates software development expertise strong collaboration excellent communication skills and a passion for enabling high quality algorithms with the user experience in focusbrbrbrThe candidate needs to show initiative take ownership of a problem and work crossfunctionally to achieve goals and communicate progressbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMSc  PhD in Computer Science or equivalent experiencebrbr brRole Number 200276677brbr
